Plot: A man and a woman are compelled, for legal reasons, to live life as a couple for a limited period of time. At stake is a large amount of money.
Title: What Happens in Vegas
Actors: Cameron Diaz, Ashton Kutcher, Rob Corddry, Lake Bell
tomatoConsensus: What Happens in Vegas has a few laughs, but mostly settles for derivative romantic comedy conventions and receives little help from a pair of unlikable leads.
